name: Pixel Zombie Apocalypse Day 3D
description:
As the result of secret radiation experiment, the world happened to be infected with pixel zombie virus. You have a really strong immunity, because you are the only who didn’t become a zombie. All the others became stupid hungry zombies having the only dream – eat you. Meet Pixel Zombie Apocalypse Day 3D – incredible horror adventures in the pixel world.

Now your only goal is survival. Try to find some food in deserted houses – you have to recuperate to fight with zombie monsters. Try to fight some weapon, even simple shovel or knife will be helpful, because independent from your skills and power it’s impossible to fight with the army of zombies barehanded. If you don’t feel brave enough, you can just hide from invaders in houses, but they’ll find you anyway, so put on a brave face and fight! Good luck you in this battle!

Pixel Zombie Apocalypse Day 3D game features:
- Incredible minimalistic design;
- Zombie survival simulator 3D;
- Large open world;
- Different activities to do;
- Great scary zombie apocalypse atmosphere.

Explore this strange low-poly world, hide from infected citizens, try to prolong your life. Pixel Zombie Apocalypse Day 3D – good luck you!
